gobblin.data.management.trash

Class ProxiedTrash

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.data.management.trash.Trash
      • gobblin.data.management.trash.ProxiedTrash
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GobblinProxiedTrash, GobblinTrash
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImmediateDeletionTrash, MockTrash

    public class ProxiedTrash
extends Trash
implements GobblinProxiedTrash
    An implementation of Trash that allows deleting files as different users. Uses ProxiedFileSystemCache to proxy as different users.

      • Fields inherited from class gobblin.data.management.trash.Trash

      • createTrashSnapshotsForAllUsers

        public void createTrashSnapshotsForAllUsers()
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Create trash snapshots for all users with trash directories. These users are determined by listing all directories in the file system matching the trash pattern given by Trash.TRASH_LOCATION_KEY.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • purgeTrashSnapshotsForAllUsers

        public void purgeTrashSnapshotsForAllUsers()
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Purge trash snapshots for all users with trash directories. These users are determined by listing all directories in the file system matching the trash pattern given by Trash.TRASH_LOCATION_KEY.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
